name: Clinical M
title: LymphomaOcularAdnexa Clin M (no UICC definition)
notes:
**Note 1:**   Involvement of peripheral and central lymph nodes, distant nodes for ocular adnexal lymphomas, is coded in lymph nodes (N) not distant metastasis (M).

**Note 2:** UICC does not define Lymphoma Ocular Adnexa. A list of all possible Clinical M values is provided.
